metadata.description: Unique DNS Name for the Public IP used to access the Virtual Machine.
The Windows version for the VM. This will pick a fully patched image of this given Windows version.
Change this value to your repo name if deploying from a fork
Use a new or existing storage account
Resource Group for storage account for VHD placement. Only needed if using existing storage account
Name of storage Account for VHD placement.
Name of storage Account container for VHD placement.
Front end port for NAT purposes for load balancer.
Back end port for NAT purposes for load balancer.
Local AD domain name to be setup.
IP address to use for domain controller and DNS.
